channel.title: Last question ever promise ( =
channel.description: master fisher--drop fish on ground how can I fix that??? spacing on easyrsc the stats are all bunched together kinda how i fix that please and thank you!! would be very grateful thats all i need!

item.title: Last question ever promise ( =
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Try this:

[code]
package org.rscdaemon.server.npchandler;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Npc;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.World;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.ChatMessage;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.MenuHandler;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.DelayedEvent;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.ShortEvent;

public class MasterFisher implements NpcHandler {

    public static final World world = World.getWorld();

    public void handleNpc(final Npc npc, Player player) throws Exception {
	  player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Do you want your bag filled of free swordfish?", player));
	  player.setBusy(true);
		world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
				public void action() {
						owner.setBusy(false);
						String[] options = new String[]{"Yes", "No"};
						owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) {
							public void handleReply(final int option, final String reply) {
							world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
								public void action() {
									owner.informOfChatMessage(new ChatMessage(owner, reply, npc));
									owner.setBusy(true);
										switch(option) {
											case 0:												
												Item item = new InvItem(370);
												while(player.getInventory().canHold(item)) {
													player.getInventory().add(item);
												}
												world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
													public void action() {
														owner.informOfChatMessage(new ChatMessage(owner, "Thank you", npc));
														owner.setBusy(false);
													}
												});
												break;
										}
								});
							}
						});
						owner.getActionSender().sendMenu(options);
				}
		});
		npc.blockedBy(player);
    }

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Last question ever promise ( =
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

[quote=“skarletdeath, post:5, topic:393831”][code][code=]package org.rscdaemon.server.npchandler;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Npc;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.World;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.ChatMessage;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.MenuHandler;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.DelayedEvent;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.ShortEvent;

public class MasterFisher implements NpcHandler {

public static final World world = World.getWorld();

public void handleNpc(final Npc npc, Player player) throws Exception {
  		player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "How many free Swordies would you like??", player));
  		player.setBusy(true);
	world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
		public void action() {
			owner.setBusy(false);
			String[] options = new String[]{"Five", "Ten", "Fifteen", "Twenty", "Twenty-Five", "None"};
			owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) {
				public void handleReply(final int option, final String reply) {
					if(owner.isBusy()) {
						return;
					}
					owner.informOfChatMessage(new ChatMessage(owner, reply, npc));
					owner.setBusy(true);
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
						public void action() {
							switch(option) {
								case 0: //5
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
										public void action() {
											owner.setBusy(false);
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
											npc.unblock();
										}
									});
									break;
								case 1: //10
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
										public void action() {
											owner.setBusy(false);
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(546, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
											npc.unblock();
										}
									});
									npc.unblock();
									break;
								case 2: //15
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
										public void action() {
											owner.setBusy(false);
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
											npc.unblock();
										}
									});
									npc.unblock();
									break;
								case 3: //20
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
										public void action() {
											owner.setBusy(false);
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
											npc.unblock();
										}
									});
									npc.unblock();
									break;
								case 4: //25
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
										public void action() {
											owner.setBusy(false);
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
											npc.unblock();
										}
									});
									npc.unblock();
									break;
								case 5:
									owner.setBusy(false);
									owner.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "Ok. Come back when you change your mind.", owner));
									npc.unblock();
									break;
								default:
									owner.setBusy(false);
									npc.unblock();
									break;
							}
							
						}
					});
				}
			});
			owner.getActionSender().sendMenu(options);
		}
	});
	npc.blockedBy(player);
}

}[/code][/quote]

Oh dear…

[code][code=]package org.rscdaemon.server.npchandler;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Npc;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.World;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.ChatMessage;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.MenuHandler;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.DelayedEvent;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.ShortEvent;

public class MasterFisher implements NpcHandler {

public static final World world = World.getWorld();

public void handleNpc(final Npc npc, Player player) throws Exception {
  		player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc, "How many free Swordies would you like??", player));
  		player.setBusy(true);
	world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
		public void action() {
			owner.setBusy(false);
			String[] options = new String[]{"Five", "Ten", "Fifteen", "Twenty", "Twenty-Five", "None"};
			owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) {

					owner.setBusy(true);
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

							switch(option) {
								case 0: //5
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

											owner.setBusy(false);
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));

											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));

									break;
								case 1: //10

											owner.setBusy(false);
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));

										}
									});
									npc.unblock();
									break;
								case 2: //15
									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
										public void action() {
											owner.setBusy(false);
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));
											owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(370, 1));

									break;

									world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

									npc.unblock();
									break;
								default:
									owner.setBusy(false);
									npc.unblock();
									break;
							}
							
						}
					});
				}
			});
			owner.getActionSender().sendMenu(options);
		}
	});
	npc.blockedBy(player);
}

}[/code]
